title: [Large-Scale] Digital Literacy-Based EFL Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Course: Text-Media Integrated Teaching Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English teaching experience (grammar/reading instruction), foundational digital tool usage, and multimedia resource integration experience
context.additional_context: For corporate elementary English education managers/leaders, enhancing the capability to design effective digital media-integrated pedagogical methods in limited technological environments (smartphone-centric), with a focus on balanced integration of text-based materials and video content.

learning_goals: Learners will propose integrated reading-listening lesson designs using smartphone-based digital tools (quiz apps, video editing tools) in EFL classroom settings.
Learners will analyze the appropriateness of text structures and vocabulary levels in English educational materials using a digital literacy evaluation framework.
Learners will establish a digital educational resource-sharing system among teachers through LMS-based collaborative task designs and develop strategies to enhance learnersâ€™ expressive abilities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
